influence.bookmarkBar: Changes the position of the prompt more upwards.
influence.windowResize: Does not change the position unless the window is really small (probably smaller than 400px wide)
influence.fullScreen: Changes the position of the prompt. Position is stable.

influence.bookmarkBar: Changes the position of the prompt more upwards.
influence.windowResize: Changes the position of the prompt to the left with window widths smaller than 1300px
influence.fullScreen: No change in the position. Position is stable.

influence.bookmarkBar: Changes the position of the prompt more to the left.
influence.windowResize: Does not change the position unless the window is really small (probably smaller than 300px wide)
influence.fullScreen: No change in the position. Position is stable.

influence.bookmarkBar: Does not change the position of the prompt.
influence.windowResize: Changes the position of the prompt. Prompt is always centered.
influence.fullScreen: Prompt is always centered. No change in the y coordinate.
